น. ฺฉูุงุณ Client ุฑุง ุงุถุงูู ฺฉูุฏ:

public class Client
{
    private readonly AbstractProductA _abstractProductA;
    private readonly AbstractProductB _abstractProductB;

    public Client(AbstractFactory factory) {
        _abstractProductA = factory.CreateProductA();
        _abstractProductB = factory.CreateProductB();
    }

    public void Run() {
        _abstractProductA.Operation(_abstractProductB);
        _abstractProductB.Operation(_abstractProductA);
    }
}

1๏ธโฃ ุงุจุชุฏุง ฺฉ ูพูุดู ุจุง ูุงู Builder ุจู ูพูุดูโ CreationalDesignPatterns ุงุถุงูู ฺฉูุฏ. ุณูพุณ ฺฉูุงุณ Product ุฑุง ุงุฌุงุฏ ฺฉูุฏ:

public class Product {
    private List<string> _parts;
    public Product() {
        _parts = new List<string>();
    }
    public void Add(string part) {
        _parts.Add(part);
    }
    public void PrintPartsList() {
        var sb = new StringBuilder();
        sb.AppendLine("Parts Listing:");
        foreach (var part in _parts)
            sb.AppendLine($"- {part}");
        Console.WriteLine(sb.ToString());
    }
}

3๏ธโฃ ุญุงูุง ฺฉูุงุณ ConcreteBuilder ุฑุง ุงุถุงูู ฺฉูุฏ:

ุณูพุณ ูุชุฏ UsingThePlusOperator() ุฑุง ุงุถุงูู ฺฉูุฏ:

public static void UsingThePlusOperator()
{
    _startTime = DateTime.Now;
    var text = string.Empty;
    for (var x = 1; x <= 10000; x++)
    {
        text += $"Line: {x}, I must not be a lazy programmer, and should continually develop myself!\n";
    }
    _durationPlus = (DateTime.Now - _startTime).Ticks;
    Console.WriteLine($"Duration (Ticks) Using Plus Operator: {_durationPlus}");
}

ุงู ูุชุฏ ุฒูุงู ูุงุฒู ุจุฑุง ุงูุญุงู ฑฐุฐฐฐ ุฑุดุชู ุจุง ุนููฺฏุฑ + ุฑุง ูุญุงุณุจู ูโฺฉูุฏ ู ุชุนุฏุงุฏ ticks ูุตุฑูโุดุฏู ุฑุง ุฐุฎุฑู ูโฺฉูุฏ.

1๏ธโฃ ฺฉ ูพูุดู ุฌุฏุฏ ุจู ูุงู Composite ุจู ูพูุดู StructuralDesignPatterns ุงุถุงูู ฺฉูุฏ.

2๏ธโฃ ฺฉูุงุณ Leaf ุฑุง ุงุถุงูู ฺฉูุฏ:

3๏ธโฃ ฺฉูุงุณ Composite ุฑุง ุงุถุงูู ฺฉูุฏ:

public class Composite : IComponent {
    private readonly string _name;
    private readonly List<IComponent> _components;
    public Composite(string name) {
        _name = name;
        _components = new List<IComponent>();
    }
    public void Add(IComponent component) {
        _components.Add(component);
    }
    public void PrintName() {
        Console.WriteLine($"Composite Name: {_name}");
        foreach (var component in _components) {
            component.PrintName();
        }
    }
}

ฺฉูุงุณ Composite ูุฒ IComponent ุฑุง ูพุงุฏูโุณุงุฒ ูโฺฉูุฏุ ูุดุงุจู ฺฉูุงุณ ุจุฑฺฏ. ุนูุงูู ุจุฑ ุงูุ Composite ูุณุช ุงุฒ ุงุฌุฒุง ุฏุงุฑุฏ ฺฉู ุจุง ูุชุฏ Add() ุงุถุงูู ูโุดููุฏ. ูุชุฏ PrintName() ุงุจุชุฏุง ูุงู ุฎูุฏ ุฑุง ฺุงูพ ูโฺฉูุฏ ู ุณูพุณ ูุงู ุชูุงู ุงุฌุฒุง ููุฌูุฏ ุฏุฑ ูุณุช ุฑุง ฺุงูพ ูโฺฉูุฏ.

ุชุณุช ูพุงุฏูโุณุงุฒ Composite

var invertebrates = new Composite("+ Invertebrates");
var vertebrates = new Composite("+ Vertebrates");

var coldBlooded = new Leaf("-- Cold-Blooded");

invertebrates.Add(withoutLegs);
vertebrates.Add(warmBlooded);
vertebrates.Add(coldBlooded);
root.Add(invertebrates);
root.Add(vertebrates);

root.PrintName();

    public FlyweightFactory()
    {

        _flyweights.Add("FlyweightTwo", new ConcreteFlyweight());
        _flyweights.Add("FlyweightThree", new ConcreteFlyweight());
    }

    }
}

ุฏุฑ ูุซุงู ูุงุ ุงุดุงุก Flyweight ุฏุฑ ฺฉ Hashtable ุฐุฎุฑู ูโุดููุฏ. ุณู Flyweight ุฏุฑ ุณุงุฒูุฏู ุงุฌุงุฏ ุดุฏูโุงูุฏ ู ูุชุฏ GetFlyweight()ุ ุดุก Flyweight ูุฑุจูุท ุจู ฺฉูุฏ ูุดุฎุต ุดุฏู ุฑุง ุจุฑูโฺฏุฑุฏุงูุฏ.

  1. ฺฉูุงุณ Client:
